body.name: Neon Arrows Page Mates (Set of 200 Sticky Notes)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 3 hrs 13 mins
body.description: Mark your place in books, planners, notebooks, documents, and more, and stay organized with these eye-catching transparent neon-colored page flags!Set includes 200 plastic page flags.Neon colors -- blue, green, yellow, orange, and pink -- stand out.5 colors, 40 each.Transparent page flags stick securely and remove cleanly.Use them to mark, tab, or highlight information. The arrow shape marks your spot!Perfect for home, school, or office.Page flags measure 1-5/8 inches wide by 1/2 inches high each.Packaged in a clear plastic sleeve on a backing card measuring 2-1/2 inches wide by 7 inches high.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product for the purpose of flagging pages in text books. These tabs stick well and they are bright so they are eye catching when trying to quickly locate a specific section in the book. The arrow tip on the adhesive side of these tabs is handy, it enables you to point to the exact location of the information you wish to access again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best book marks ever !
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these sticky bookmarks/ book-markers that can act also as a highlight for all books either paperback or hardcover! The adhesion works really good and is able to stay in place for long periods of time unless you move it around over and over and of course the adhesion is going to give out but there’s plenty more where that came because you get plenty ! Also these are harmless to books which is wonderful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So convenient and handy!
reviews.reviewText: I love these bookmarks. I especially like that the container is a bookmark in itself. I have bought many of these. I keep a set in the books I am reading. Brilliant!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are great because I can write with my pencil on them. They stick great and are very durable because they’re made out of very thing plastic instead of paper.I was at the store trying to get tabs but they were so pricy! So these are great also because they’re inexpensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are great for marking pages and verses in your bible

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These tabs are great!
reviews.reviewText: I'm currently studying and needed to color code my 1000 page book by chapter, topic and other things I deem important to come back to at a later time.Name brand tabs are expensive and most were too large or thick for what I wanted. These are literally perfect. They are a thin plastic, not paper (which is exactly what I was looking for, I didn't want them to tear), transparent so they don't cover/block text (you can place them anywhere on the page) and honestly pull off easily enough and cleanly so you can replace them if you suck at placement like I do. A while you can lift them easily enough, they do stick very well and don't come off unless you want them to.I have zero complaints, they were a great buy. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Todo muy bien

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These translucent stickers work well to mark pages, patterns, etc.
reviews.reviewText: You have to use a permanent marker to write on them. They stick well to the page and having different colors is convenient.

I was looking for a way to mark my highlights so that I could go back later and take notes.I came across these and tried them out— exactly what I needed.Before, I used to use sticky notes, made out of paper. These worked fine, but especially with thinner paper, it was prone to rip and I had to be very careful.This product removes all that worry and caution. Of course you don’t want to tear the flags off but they stick well and are removed effortlessly.I use them whenever I read a new book and want to get as much out of it as possible.Highly recommend to any book lover, student, author, etc…
Caros pero están bien para su uso, si los volvería a comprar aunque un producto así y con más cantidad de banderitas salen más baratos en la competencia de Amazon

Excelentes para poder hacer marcas en los libros (principalmente lo uso para eso) y para notas en los cuadernos, es bueno para guiarte para ideas, frases o contextos importantes en caso de que los uses para tu estudio, no se pegan al papel con agresividad pero aun asi hay que tener cuidado, muy satisfecho con la compra!
Excellent quality,i love the colors it helps for organizing
